thread.title: Car driven by 92-year-old mows down 6 adults and 2 children
thread.title_full: Car driven by 92-year-old mows down 6 adults and 2 children

author: Leon Watson
title: Car driven by 92-year-old mows down 6 adults and 2 children
text: Road and rail transport Car driven by 92-year-old mows down 6 adults and 2 children Baby girl and two-year-old boy were both catapulted out of pushchairs when the silver coloured VW Polo slammed into them in Guildford, Surrey The car ploughed into pedestrians outside the Friary Centre in Guildford Photo: Get Surrey/BPM
